tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_management (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    current_stock INT,
    forecasted_stock INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    quantity_sold INT NOT NULL,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_levels (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  current_level INT,
  forecasted_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_availability (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  warehouse_id INT,
  available_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE forecasting_models (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(255),
  algorithm_used VARCHAR(255),
  model_accuracy FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  sales_date DATE,
  quantity_sold INT
)

CREATE TABLE ForecastingModels (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name TEXT,
  algorithm TEXT,
  accuracy FLOAT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  category TEXT,
  price DECIMAL,
  supplier_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  contact_number TEXT,
  email TEXT
);
